resources:
CST_2335_Final_Project
NASA Image Of The Date Click to Start!
Main Menu v2.0 Main Menu View Today\'s Image Select Date to View Image View Saved Images
Main Menu Today\'s Image Button: Brings user to Image View Activity and displays the image for current date. Pick Date Button: Brings the user to Pick Date Activity. Saved Image Button: Brings user to saved Images Activity.
Pick Date Button: Brings the user to Pick Date Activity.
Saved Image Button: Brings user to saved Images Activity.
Image View v2.0 Date: URL: Explanation: View HD Image Added to favorite ImageData list. View Favorites Now! Save Image
Image Viewer Activity Image Explanation: Text can be scrolled if it does not fit the screen. View HD Image Button: When this button is clicked it will open the default browser and displayed the HD Image within. Save Image Button: When this button is clicked the current image and its data will be saved within the application memory.
DatePicker v2.0
Date Picker Activity View Selected Date Button: When clicked this will load the View Image Activity and load the image for the selected date. Click To View Button: When this button is clicked it will load the Image Activity with the date entered manually by the user. (Date Format: yyyy-mm-dd)
Saved Images v2.0
Saved Images Activity When an image is clicked on it will open a window displaying detail information about the saved image. When an image is long clicked it will open an alert window asking if you would like to delete this entry from the applcaiton memory.
Home Today\'s Image Pick Date Saved Images Information | Help
